name: Earn Your Freedom
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam 206
The week's theme: Clockwork

Description: Find your way out from the clockwork dungeon and earn your freedom.

Control:  Space for jump.

Made by

Adam Hajdu: Project Manager, Environment Artist, and Programmer https://www.artstation.com/adamhajdu
Viktoria Berta: Art Director and Prop Artist https://www.artstation.com/viktoriaberta
Octavio Bernal: Music
Max Wang (Lacklustrr): Sound Designer

Engine: Unreal Engine 5 Platform: PC Mode: Single-player

Recommended System Requirement

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4720HQ CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 8.00GB
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960M
  • Storage: 1.3 GB
